has research problem: Multimodal Speech Emotion Recognition and Ambiguity Resolution

has research problem.from sentence: Multimodal Speech Emotion Recognition and Ambiguity Resolution
Identifying emotion from speech is a nontrivial task pertaining to the ambiguous definition of emotion itself .
With the rise of deep learning algorithms , there have been multiple attempts to tackle the task of Speech Emotion Recognition ( SER ) as in [ 2 ] and .
In this work , we explore the implication of hand - crafted features for SER and compare the performance of lighter machine learning models with the heavily data - reliant deep learning models .
